questions.question_text_1: Which of the following is true?

options.option_text: The perceptron learning algorithm will converge on D2
The perceptron learning algorithm will converge on D1

questions.question_text_1: To learn the parameters of a neural network for a classification problem, mini-batch gradient descent is run on a dataset of size 1000 with batch size of 25 for 10 epochs. Find the number of times each parameter is updated.
question_texts: To learn the parameters of a neural network for a classification problem, mini-batch gradient descent is run on a dataset of size 1000 with batch size of 25 for 10 epochs. Find the number of times each parameter is updated.
